title: Tuesday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
COSMIC HORRORS Episode 1: The Temple

THE LOST ERA TRANSCRIPTS Episode 21: The Deep Dark Hole

上嫁小鼠 Episode 26: 你很幸运

A MIND PROGRAMMED Episode 39: Escalated Contest

THE GRYPHON OF TIRSHAL Episode 7: Moonlight Revelation

REBEL DEAD REVENGE Episode 86: Sweet Mother Mary

HAMMER OF FREEDOM 2 Episode 20: In the Golden Ages

GORGO Episode 30: The Return of Gorgo

STONETOSS Episode 237: The Great Pumpkin

Appropriately enough, Arktoons has introduced today a new illustrated text series by HP Lovecraft, entitled COSMIC HORRORS.
